title: Canada Police Step Up Warning to Freedom Convoy Protesters
sub_head: ‘You must leave now,’ Ottawa police say in notice to truckers, demonstrators
body:
OTTAWA—Ottawa police officers visited hundreds of heavy-duty trucks and other vehicles parked downtown and in front of the national legislature Wednesday, delivering notices to their owners and other protesters demanding they leave a demonstration zone immediately or face arrest and criminal charges.
“You must leave the area now,” the notice from Ottawa police said.
